ai-tha-ap439:0.3_0: He then went to Mango Grove, sometimes the senior monks.
ai-tha-ap439:1.2_0: as it is from the wind.
ai-tha-ap439:2.2_0: whatever fruit he enjoyed the fruit,
ai-tha-ap439:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap439:2.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
ai-tha-ap439:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap439:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap439:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kaṇṭaka.
ai-tha-ap439:7.1_0: the seventh mango grove is a hundred thousand senior monks.
